title: update download

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: the update has been stuck like this for the past 20 minutes and hasn't moved at all.

replies.body: Your connection might be having trouble snagging updates and causing the patcher to backtrack.  See if the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide helps tune things up a bit for you.
